Hi all,

I have a doubt/difficulty in JUnit to handle..

Junit prints a dot=
 "." on the screen as soon as it runs a test
successfully. Is there a way t=
o disable this feature ? I want no dots
to be printed on the console..

JUn=
it also prints a "F" or an "E" if it encounters failures or
run-time errors=
.. Although I would like to disable these as well.. I
would first like to d=
eal with the "." 's..

Thanks in advance,
Mahendra.
